# 1.1 Study organization

```{r}
courses <- vroom(here("data","courses.csv"))

```
```{r}
courses |>
  arrange(course) |>
  rename(
    `course name`    = course,
    identifier       = course_id,
    module           = module,
    `number of exams` = nb_grades
  )
```
